Item ID26460

The tier 1 Shattered boots is a tradeable cosmetic item. It is part of the tier 3 Shattered Relic Hunter, which can be purchased for 15,000 League points from the Leagues Reward Shop.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room. It can also be displayed (with the rest of the outfit) by using it on furniture built in the League hall's outfit stand space.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 March 2022
(update | poll)
  • The item is now obtainable.
  • The string "relic hunter" within the item's examine text has been changed to "Relic Hunter".
19 January 2022
(update)

The item was added to the game.

[[File:Shattered boots (t3) detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''tier 1 Shattered boots''' is a tradeable cosmetic item. It is part of the [[Shattered Relic Hunter (T3)|tier 3 Shattered Relic Hunter]], which can be purchased for 15,000 League points from the [[Leagues Reward Shop]].

{{Costume storage|armour case}} It can also be displayed (with the rest of the outfit) by using it on furniture built in the [[League hall]]'s [[outfit stand space]].
